effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.
